name: Boilerplate v3.0
description: Boilerplate for new Eleventy websites using Eleventy 3.0 features.

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npx lightningcss --minify css/main.css -o css/main.min.css && npx uglify-js js/animations.js js/index.js -o js/index.min.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npx lightningcss --minify css/main.css -o css/main.min.css && npx uglify-js js/animations.js js/index.js -o js/index.min.js

author: George Braden
